body_content.explanation: a list of drugs, together with information on their effects and instructions on how they should be used :
examples: In most countries there is an official pharmacopoeia, and any dispensed drug must comply with its standards.
They did not easily fit into the existing pharmacopoeias as regular drugs.

body_content.explanation: a supply or collection of drugs:
examples: Nature offers a vast pharmacopoeia of remedies that medical science has at last begun to explore.
Over the years, he worked his way through a pharmacopoeia of recreational drugs.
